question.text: Which of the following statements is incorrect?

options.text: In <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math> plants, the site of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>RuBisCO</mi></math> activity is mesophyll cell

The substrate molecule for <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>RuBisCO</mi></math> activity is a <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mn>5</mn><mo>-</mo></math>carbon compound

solution.text: In <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math> plants, the fixation of carbon dioxide takes place in mesophyll cells with the help of enzyme <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>PEPcase</mi></math>. The synthesis of sugar takes place in bundle-sheath cells with the help of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mi>RuBisCO</mi></math> enzymes.
